com.github.theholywaffle.lolchatapi.listeners

Interface FriendListener


  • public interface FriendListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFriendAvailable(Friend friend)
      Gets called when a friends chat is available (green circle).
      void onFriendAway(Friend friend)
      Gets called when a friend is away (yellow circle).
      void onFriendBusy(Friend friend)
      Gets called when a friend is busy (yellow circle).
      void onFriendJoin(Friend friend)
      Gets called when a friend logs in.
      void onFriendLeave(Friend friend)
      Gets called when a friend logs out.
      void onFriendStatusChange(Friend friend)
      Gets called when the status of a friend changes.
      void onNewFriend(Friend friend)
      Gets called when a new friend is added and you both accepted each other request.
      void onRemoveFriend(String userId)
      Gets called when a friend is deleted or the person declines your friend request.

    • Method Detail

      • onFriendAvailable

        void onFriendAvailable(Friend friend)
        Gets called when a friends chat is available (green circle).
        Parameters:
        friend - The friend who becomes available

      • onFriendAway

        void onFriendAway(Friend friend)
        Gets called when a friend is away (yellow circle).
        Parameters:
        friend - The friend who becomes away

      • onFriendBusy

        void onFriendBusy(Friend friend)
        Gets called when a friend is busy (yellow circle). (e.g. waiting in queue, champion select, loading screen, ingame).
        Parameters:
        friend - The friend who becomes busy

      • onFriendJoin

        void onFriendJoin(Friend friend)
        Gets called when a friend logs in.
        Parameters:
        friend - The friend who logs in

      • onFriendLeave

        void onFriendLeave(Friend friend)
        Gets called when a friend logs out.
        Parameters:
        friend - The friend who logs out

      • onFriendStatusChange

        void onFriendStatusChange(Friend friend)
        Gets called when the status of a friend changes. This can happen when he changes his profile icon, enters a game, joins a queue, changes division. Basically everything that can also be found when hovering over your friend in the ingame client.
        Parameters:
        friend - The friend who changes status

      • onNewFriend

        void onNewFriend(Friend friend)
        Gets called when a new friend is added and you both accepted each other request.
        Parameters:
        friend - The new Friend.

      • onRemoveFriend

        void onRemoveFriend(String userId)
        Gets called when a friend is deleted or the person declines your friend request.
        Parameters:
        userId - The XMPP-address of the user who deleted you or declined your friend request (e.g. sum12345678@pvp.net).
